body: Good guy didnt said that teacher slut , the one who made this  is kazuya asshole. Yes im talking people like kazuya. Jun need to kill kazuya in order to prevent someone girl/woman life. Imagine some of your relative gonna through like. All of you for fuck sake always blame the unlucky one. Why not smash or blame kazuya. Really?

@Reyas he would easily get 10 years jail time and i can count 6 charges already .
Should be even more.

the logic is too grating for a human eyes..You cant change your past but mf you can change your future Miss Teach...Use that evidence to shove him aside if u are afraid to go to the police ..
As for Jun he should get help and leave this place.

@Kami Nana I disagree. I think it is far more satisfying that Jun recognized that defending the honor of a lying cockslut like Katsuko would be foolish. Kazuya isn't even doing anything wrong. Yeah he's kind of a jerk but remember that Katsuko wouldn't even let Jun finger her at school but she's fine with getting loudly full-on  fucked  when it's Kazuya,  or even exposing herself to Jun during class.  It's Katsuko that's the problem, it was always Katsuko. Jun made the right choice here, 100%.

He made the smarter choice...but, gods, it's unsatisfying. Would have been better to have a few more chapters where we can see him completely ignoring her...or leaving the school altogether...thus making everything she did to keep him from being expelled rendered useless. To see her truly fall into despair for her stupidity would have been best. Even better would be Jun getting a new girlfriend and showing her how happy he is with a good woman beside him.

@LaharlZat He didn't chicken out...he just seen no use to it. She was a lost cause and he'd only get in trouble for it. While I would have liked him to do so, too, and show her what her actions did to his mentality...he made the better choice by just abandoning her to her stupidity.

Okay...after actually reading it...yeah, Jun should have gutted Kazuya and showed the dumb bitch that everything she did resulted in driving him crazy like this...so everything she did "for him" was wrong and it only made it worse. Still wouldn't have taken her back, though.
"I need to repent for what I did to Jun"...does exactly the opposite of that. Gods, this woman is so fucking retarded. Jun made the correct choice throwing this dumb bitch away.
@바유삼 @LaharlZat Nah, he made the right choice, that bitch wasn't worth it in so many ways...
Poor man, if that was me.. really kill that bastard and take she back, for sure be slave in entire of her life for guilty sake what she has made..
The thing at the end was a switchblade of course. Shame he chickend out.
